metadata.title: Join us on your healing journey
metadata.description: Bloom is here for you to learn, heal and grow towards a confident future. It is bought to you by Chayn, a global non-profit, run by survivors and allies from around the world.
metadata.imageAlt: Illustration of a person's face and shoulders, with big leaves and flowers blooming above them. The Bloom typography logo is included.

footer.chaynDescription: Bloom is brought to you by <link>Chayn</link>, a global non-profit, run by survivors and allies from around the world, creating resources to support the healing of survivors of gender-based violence.

maintenanceBanner.title: Bloom is down for maintenance
maintenanceBanner.description: Please bear with us whilst we complete some essential planned maintenance. Bloom should be available as usual within {hours} hours.

noDataAvailable.title: There was an issue loading this page. Please go back and try again soon, or get in touch.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: There was an issue with that last request, please try again. If the issue persists, get in touch with the bloom team.

404.title: 404 - Page not found
404.authenticatedDescription: This page could not be found. Check the url or go back to the courses page.
404.unauthenticatedDescription: This page could not be found. Check the url or go back to the welcome page.

500.title: 500 - Internal error
500.description: Hmm, something went wrong there. Please go back and try again. Get in touch via the contact form if the error continues.

cookieConsent.cookieConsentExplainer: Please allow analytics cookies so we can improve Bloom. Read more in our

signUpTodayPromo.title: Sign up for a free account today
signUpTodayPromo.description1: Bloom is an online platform to support you as you heal from trauma. From video courses and reflective activities to direct messaging with our team, there's lots of different ways to engage with Bloom.
signUpTodayPromo.description2: Sign up today to get access to all of our content and explore everything Bloom has to offer!

exerciseNames.activities-mapping-fear-and-stress-in-ou: Mapping fear and stress in our bodies
exerciseNames.activities-letter-to-a-part-of-my-body: Letter to a part of my body
exerciseNames.grounding-coming-back-to-your-safe-space: Coming back to your safe space
